items.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
items.description: Tech shares slumped on Wednesday, dragging the S&P 500 to its fourth straight losing session. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Thursday.

items.title: Crypto treasury firms whose shares once soared have tumbled in August. Here are the big winners and losers
items.description: Crypto accumulators became central players this summer as investors sought bigger returns during a bitcoin price slump.

items.title: Buy these stocks that consistently beat earnings estimates and are liked by analysts, Jefferies says
items.description: The firm used artificial intelligence to screen for positive analyst sentiment on earnings calls.

items.title: This biotech stock could see a sharp swing higher after years of struggling, charts suggest
items.description: Chart analyst Frank Cappelleri breaks down the technical outlook on the biotech stock.

items.title: Walmart is due to report earnings on Thursday. Here’s what analysts say to expect
items.description: Several analysts are optimistic about Walmart heading into the second-quarter print, even after the stock's outperformance since the start of the year...
